sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'
import { connect } from 'react-redux'
import Home from '../Home/Home'
import GISubmit from '../GISubmit/GISubmit'
import GICheck from '../GICheck/GICheck'
import DOSubmit from '../DOSubmit/DOSubmit'
import DOCheck from '../DOCheck/DOCheck'
import GIReqDetail from '../GIReqDetail/GIReqDetail'
import DOReqDetail from '../DOReqDetail/DOReqDetail'
import { Redirect, Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom'
import { Layout } from 'antd';
import GIStatistics from '../GIStatistics/GIStatistics'
import DOStatistics from '../DOStatistics/DOStatistics'

const { Content } = Layout;

class DashboardContent extends Component {
    render() {
        return (
            <Content className="site-layout-background" style={{ padding: 24, margin: 0, minHeight: 280}}>
                <Switch>
                    <Route path="/dashboard/home" component={Home}></Route>
                    <Route path="/dashboard/gi-submit" component={GISubmit}></Route>
                    <Route path="/dashboard/gi-check" component={GICheck}></Route>
                    <Route path="/dashboard/do-submit" component={DOSubmit}></Route>
                    <Route path="/dashboard/do-check" component={DOCheck}></Route>
                    <Route path="/dashboard/gi-statistics" component={GIStatistics}></Route>
                    <Route path="/dashboard/do-statistics" component={DOStatistics}></Route>
                    <Route path="/dashboard/do-request-detail" component={DOReqDetail}></Route>
                    <Route path="/dashboard/gi-request-detail" component={GIReqDetail}></Route>
                    <Route path="/dashboard/do-request-detail" component={DOReqDetail}></Route>
                    <Redirect to="/dashboard/home" />
                </Switch>
            </Content>
        )
    }
}

export default connect(
    state => ({}),
    {}
)(DashboardContent)
